title: Panormos (settlement, port)
description: An ancient settlement presumed to have been co-located with a harbor (limen) mentioned by Pausanias as lying 15 stadia east of the Rhion Pr. (modern Rio in Greece), on the north coast of the Peloponnese.

properties.description: Modern location in the general area identified by John McK. Camp II for Pausanias' Panormos limen. After Geonames, verified in Google Earth.
properties.title: Ayios Vasilios
